mention.text: Allen , who said Bryant Allen heard but did not see his friend being beaten '' Then
Bryant Allen and his friends , all unemployed
one of King 's passengers , Bryant Allen , who says Rodney G. King was manhandled and taunted in a racially motivated attempt to provoke him
the car '' Rodney G. King was screaming , ` Stop
his friend being beaten kind of
the two-minute beating that has been shown repeatedly on national television
his friends , all unemployed to a park where Bryant Allen had gone in the past with Bryant Allen father
the flashing lights of a California Highway Patrol car behind them
